name: LifeWorks
description: LifeWorks, previously Morneau Shepell, was a Toronto-based human resources services and technology company founded in 1966. Serving 24,000 clients across North America, LifeWorks combines digital and human elements seamlessly. Their AI-driven solutions simplify complexities for individuals and HR leaders across diverse industries, communities, and households, ensuring accessibility and ease of use in every interaction.
features: Empower people by supporting their wellbeing
sub_categories: Software and Services Related to HR Software
Headline: Happy, healthy and empowered people are the heart of high-performing organizations
ShortDescription: LifeWorks provides personalized solutions that feature the level of support that people need

Highlights.name: End-to-end wellbeing
Highlights.description: Virtual and in-person care, financial planning seminars, and cost-saving strategies prioritize your wellbeing.

Highlights.name: Expand your benefits
Highlights.description: Our team ensures customized care, providing timely support to employees

Highlights.name: Help attract and retain talent
Highlights.description: Prioritizing wellbeing fosters positive cultures and strengthens recruitment and retention efforts.

enhanced_description: LifeWorks, formerly Morneau Shepell, is a Toronto-based human resources services and technology company established in 1966. Serving 24,000 clients across North America, LifeWorks delivers personalized, AI-driven solutions that seamlessly integrate digital tools with human support. Their offerings simplify complexities for individuals, employees, and HR leaders across diverse industries, focusing on improving employee happiness, engagement, and overall wellbeing. By providing end-to-end wellbeing support, including virtual and in-person care, financial planning, and cost-saving strategies, LifeWorks aims to empower people, strengthen organizational resiliency, and enhance talent attraction and retention efforts, ensuring accessibility and ease of use in every interaction.
key_use_cases: Employee wellbeing support (virtual, in-person, financial planning)
competitive_advantages: Seamless combination of digital and human support elements
AI-driven solutions for simplifying HR and individual complexities
Comprehensive end-to-end wellbeing solutions (virtual and in-person care, financial planning)
Focus on customized and timely employee support
Emphasis on accessibility and ease of use
roi_benefits: Potential cost savings through wellbeing strategies
